name: Roam-highlighter-DEV
description: Highlight text on page to copy to Roam

_execute_browser_action.description: Activates highlighter and shows/hides Side Window

remove-all-highlights.description: Clears all the current highlights on the page

add-double-brackets.description: Add double brackets around selected text in Highlight for Roam page linking

convert-to-header.description: Select any text from a highlighted item and mark as Header so bullets are indented under it.
